title: Additional electrical outlets - Building A units
description: Owner requested 2 additional duplex outlets per bedroom and dedicated 20A circuit for kitchen island in all 120 units. Includes panel upgrades.

title: Unforeseen rock removal - Building B foundation
description: Encountered limestone shelf at 4 feet below grade across Building B footprint requiring rock hammering and removal. Geotechnical report did not indicate rock at this depth.

title: Upgraded lobby finishes - Office Tower
description: Architect revised lobby design to include full-height marble walls and custom reception desk. Replaces original drywall and paint specification.

title: HVAC system upsizing - Office Tower floors 8-10
description: Mechanical engineer determined original equipment undersized for floors 8-10 due to revised tenant occupancy loads. Upgrading 3 AHUs from 15-ton to 20-ton.

title: Bridge approach guardrail upgrade
description: TxDOT revised standard to require TL-4 rated barrier instead of original TL-3 specification. Heavier steel sections and modified anchorage required.

title: Value engineering - substitute roofing system
description: Replace specified modified bitumen roof with TPO single-ply membrane on Buildings A and B. Equivalent warranty with reduced material and labor cost.
